pages.text:
The Nether Quartz Chicken is a silicon mineral chicken. For some reason, its body is chiseled to resemble a pillar. Doesn't have cleavage!
Lay Item: Nether Quartz.$(br2)Some people believe that Quartz Chickens contain magical powers and the ability to promote growth in a garden, or to attract certain energies into the home. These claims are unsubstantinated.
